name: PNPCoin
description: PNPC (PNPCoin) is a community token originating from the Web3 brand PiXiu Club, with a constant total supply of 100 million , all of which are in circulation. Originally airdropped to the community from MeMe Coin holders of PNP NFTs, PNPC is gradually evolving into a practical metaverse token with a wide range of applications.
